attributes.additional_details:
-Kurds are currently defending their borders against ISIS with not so modern and limited weapons.
-The kurds have regained all its territory back from ISIS.
-ISIS struggle when in battle against the kurds
attributes.background: Kurdistan has been divided into 4 different countries, which are in Iraq, Turkey, Syria and iran. Kurds are a large ethnic group with a population of 35 million and without their own nation. We kurds deserve our own nation and independence , we have our own language, national anthem, national flag..

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to make Kurdistan an independent country. You could start a new  petition calling on the UK Government to press the governments of Iraq, Turkey, Syria and Iran to grant Kurdistan independence.
